mapper.sql: BI_NUM, BI_TITLE, BI_CONTENT, UI_NUM, BI_FILE_PATH, BI_FILE_NAME, CREDAT, CRETIM, LMODAT, LMOTIM, ACTIVE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO(BI_NUM,BI_TITLE, BI_CONTENT, UI_NUM, BI_FILE_PATH, BI_FILE_NAME) VALUES(#{biNum},#{biTitle},#{biContent},#{uiNum},#{biFilePath},#{biFileName})
mapper.select: SELECT BI_NUM, BI_TITLE, BI_CONTENT, UI_NUM, BI_FILE_PATH, BI_FILE_NAME, CREDAT, CRETIM, LMODAT, LMOTIM FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE BI_NUM=#{biNum}

SELECT BI.BI_NUM, BI.BI_TITLE, BI.UI_NUM, UI.UI_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(BI.CREDAT,'%y-%m-%d') CREDAT, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(BI.CRETIM,'%h%i%s'),'%h:%i:%s') CRETIM, BI.BI_FILE_NAME FROM BOARD_INFO BI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON BI.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM ORDER BY BI_NUM ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD_INFO BI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON BI.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM
